sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This document describes the specific tests to be carried out during the system test of the pointLoad component. The purpose of pointLoad is to extract point data from gridded data files (FELT | GRIB1 | GRIB2 | NETCDF) and prepare them for loading into WDB. In order to do the actual loading one must use wdb-fastload. The pointLoad is to deliver data in the format known to wdb-fastload. For more information on wdb-fastload and it's formats see: wdb-fastload (see https://github.com/wdb/wdb-contrib). pointLoad sends extracted data either to standard out or to a file (see available command line options).

sect2.title: Purpose

listitem.para: Clarify the functionality/performance/accesibility requirements of the system
Clearly specify which tests must be passed for the component to be accepted for production
Document the consensus for the level of testing of the wdb-pointLoad utility

sect2.para: For each test, it must be defined who has the responsibility for performing the test. Any limitations with respect to the test must also be specified (e.g., for example if the test has yet to be implemented).

sect2.title: Controlling Document
sect2.para: The test specification and implemented tests in the pointLoad component follow the principles described in the WDB Test plan [1].

sect1.title: Compilation Test
sect1.para: There should be no warnings during the compilation or linking of the wdb-pointLoad utiluty.

sect1.title: Unit Tests
sect1.para: Unit tests will make sure that wdb-pointLoad is producing expected output when processing test input files. There are 4 input files for each type that pointloade can handle (felt | grib1 | grib2 | netcdf).
